Package view

Interface View

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLIDemo, Framework
    public interface View
    This interface contains all the methods used by View classes to communicate with the external world.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void chooseAction​(java.util.List<ActionView> action, boolean single, boolean optional, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String choiceId)
      This method is used when an action must be chosen by the Client.
      void choosePowerUp​(java.util.List<PowerUpView> powerUp, boolean single, boolean optional, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String choiceId)
      This method is used when a powerUp must be chosen by the Client.
      void chooseString​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> string, boolean single, boolean optional, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String choiceId)
      This method is used when a String must be chosen by the Client.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseTarget

        void chooseTarget​(java.util.List<TargetView> target,
                  boolean single,
                  boolean optional,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  GameMapView gameMap,
                  java.lang.String choiceId)
        This method is used when a target must be chosen by the Client. The response is sent through the pick method
        Parameters:
        gameMap - The map that refers to the choose
        choiceId - The identifier of the selector.
        single - True iif only one element can be chosen
        optional - True iif an empty list can be chosen
        target - A List containing all the element that can be chosen

      • chooseAction

        void chooseAction​(java.util.List<ActionView> action,
                  boolean single,
                  boolean optional,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.String choiceId)
        This method is used when an action must be chosen by the Client. The response is sent through the pick method
        Parameters:
        choiceId - The identifier of the selector.
        single - True iif only one element can be chosen
        optional - True iif an empty list can be chosen
        action - A List containing all the element that can be chosen

      • chooseWeapon

        void chooseWeapon​(java.util.List<WeaponView> weapon,
                  boolean single,
                  boolean optional,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.String choiceId)
        This method is used when an weapon must be chosen by the Client. The response requires a List of object, and is sent through the pick method
        Parameters:
        choiceId - The identifier of the selector.
        single - True iif only one element can be chosen
        optional - True iif an empty list can be chosen
        weapon - A List containing all the element that can be chosen

      • choosePowerUp

        void choosePowerUp​(java.util.List<PowerUpView> powerUp,
                   boolean single,
                   boolean optional,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   java.lang.String choiceId)
        This method is used when a powerUp must be chosen by the Client. The response requires a List of object, and is sent through the pick method
        Parameters:
        choiceId - The identifier of the selector.
        single - True iif only one element can be chosen
        optional - True iif an empty list can be chosen
        powerUp - A List containing all the element that can be chosen

      • chooseString

        void chooseString​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> string,
                  boolean single,
                  boolean optional,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.String choiceId)
        This method is used when a String must be chosen by the Client. The response requires a List of object, and is sent through the pick method
        Parameters:
        choiceId - The identifier of the selector.
        single - True iif only one element can be chosen
        optional - True iif an empty list can be chosen
        string - A List containing all the element that can be chosen

      • terminated

        void terminated()
        Method that notifies when the current Action is completed

      • updateMap

        void updateMap​(GameMapView gameMapView,
               boolean forced)
        This method gives to the View the last valid GameMap
        Parameters:
        gameMapView - The map

      • loginResponse

        void loginResponse​(boolean result,
                   boolean invalidUsername,
                   boolean invalidColor)
        This method is used as a response to a Login request
        Parameters:
        result - True iif the login procedure terminated correctly
        invalidUsername - True if the username or the password are already used/not the right ones
        invalidColor - True if the Color is already used

      • loginNotif

        void loginNotif()
        Avvisa la view che si puÃ² effettuare il login

      • onConnection

        void onConnection​(Player player,
                  boolean connected,
                  int numOfPlayer)
        This notification is used when a player logs in or logs out the game
        Parameters:
        player - The player that logged-in or out
        connected - True if the player logged in, False if the player logged out
        numOfPlayer - How many players already logged in

      • onStarting

        void onStarting​(java.lang.String map,
                GameMode gameMode)
        Method used to notify that the game is starting
        Parameters:
        map - the name of the configuration Map used in the game. Useful for the GUI

      • onTimer

        void onTimer​(int timeToCount)
        Method used to notify the user that an action must be performed in a certain amount of time.
        Parameters:
        timeToCount - Millisecond before timer end.

      • onRespawn

        void onRespawn()
        Method used to notify the user that he has to respawn. The view only need to print a text message representing the event.

      • onTakeback

        void onTakeback()
        Method used to notify the user that he can use a takeback grenade. The view only need to print a text message representing the event.

      • onTerminator

        void onTerminator()
        Method used to notify the user that he can move the Terminator. The view only need to print a text message representing the event. [THIS FUNCTIONALITY IS NOT IMPLEMENTED]

      • onRollback

        void onRollback()
        Method used to notify the user that the current flow of actions cannot be continued and a rollback has been made. The view only need to print a text message representing the event.

      • onWinner

        void onWinner​(java.lang.String winner,
              int winnerPoints,
              int yourPoints)
        Method used to notify the user that the game is terminated. It contains the name of the winner, his and your score
        Parameters:
        winner - The username of the winner
        winnerPoints - The score of the winner
        yourPoints - Your score

      • onCredits

        void onCredits()
        After the game is finished credits are printed

      • onMessage

        void onMessage​(Message message)
        Method used to notify the user of all the effect applied to the map and to the players Message should contain a List of element that only holds a printable message

      • onLostTurn

        void onLostTurn​(Player player)
        Method used to notify the user that a player lost his turn because his timer finished
        Parameters:
        player -
